attributes.action: LET ALL PARENTS BE LISTENED TO AND NOT BE IGNORED BY SOCIAL WORKERS FOR WELL BEING OF THIER CHILDREN
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WE,AND THOUSANDS OF PEOPLE ARE NOT BEING LISTENED TO BY THE SOCIAL SERVICES.WE ASK QUESTIONS AND ARE TOLD NOTHING.OUR VIEWS DO NOT COUNT WHEN MAKING DECISIONS BY THEM.ON NUMEROUS OCCASIONS YOU CAN NOT GET A ANSWER OFF THEM.THIS IS WHY THERE IS MISSFEELINGS WITH SOCIAL SERVICES.THE PARENTS WANT A VOICE AS WELL.PARENTS FEEL LET DOWN BY THEM.I AM SETTING UP A ORGANIZATION CALLED PARENTS NEED ANSWERS.WHICH I EXPECT THOUSANDS TO JOIN TO BE HEARD

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
